Package it.unimi.dsi.law.rank

PageRank (and variants) computation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PageRank.StoppingCriterion A stopping criterion is a strategy that decides when a PageRank computation should be stopped.
 

Class Summary
GeneralHyperbolicRank This class computes the General Hyperbolic Rank as described in “Generalizing PageRank: Damping Functions for Link-Based Ranking Algorithms”, by Ricardo Baeza-Yates, Paolo Boldi, and Carlos Castillo, in Proc. of the 29th ACM SIGIR, pages 308−315, 2006.
PageRank A base abstract class definining methods and attributes supporting PageRank (or similar) computations.
PageRank.IterationNumberStoppingCriterion A stopping criterion that stops whenever the number of iterations exceeds a given bound.
PageRank.NormDeltaStoppingCriterion A stopping criterion that evaluates the norm of the difference between the last two iterates, and stops if this value is smaller than a given threshold.
PageRankGaussSeidel Computes PageRank of the transpose of a graph using the Gauss–Seidel method.
PageRankJacobi Computes PageRank using the Jacobi method.
PageRankPowerMethod Computes PageRank using the Power Method.
PageRankPowerSeries Computes PageRank using its power series.
 

Enum Summary
PageRank.Norm Possible norms, with an implementation.
 

Package it.unimi.dsi.law.rank Description

PageRank (and variants) computation.
